entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 28 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this morning. Blowing snow at times. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 28 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 44 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 27 January 2023
